document.full_text: rafa nadal and roger federer remained on course for their first head-to-head clash this year after easily winning their third round matches at the sony ericsson open on monday.
document.title: federer and nadal progress in miami
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal and roger federer remained on course for their first head-to-head clash this year after easily winning their third round matches at the sony ericsson open on monday.
